about_the_game:
Background Story

In 2100, Republik Kugelmugel almost takes over the world. It is the largest empire that has almost 5 billion people and affecting all around the world including Europe, America, and Africa. After the 3rd world war, Republik Kugelmugel renamed to Cinor Empire. The capital is located at Yilifu. Cinor is an empire. However, it is a presidential government. Cinor Empire also pursues aristocracy. The people organized a rebel force named Kronoc and it is located in El Provencio. Kronoc hires Asin, which is a biotechnology company, for their genetically modified soldiers to revolt. Afterward, Cinor Empire also hires Asin to fight back.

Features

  • Combining FPS and MMORPG elements into a single game
  • Special skill system
  • Weapon customization
  • Including maps in Hong Kong & Taiwan & Korea

Disclaimer: The game provides only Asian servers (located in Hong Kong & Taiwan). If you are outside of Asia, you may experience latency issue.

name: HEAT REBORN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 2100 or AMD FX-4100 processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must have 1 GB or more VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 20H1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2400 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: HEAT REBORN is a free massively multiplayer online first-person shooter. Completely re-created the original HEAT PROJECT with modern game engine. Brings you the improvement of graphics, game balance, and even with numbers of new game mode for you!
